proof_script:
lemma epred_enat_unfold [simp]: "epred (enat_unfold stop next a) = (if stop a then 0 else enat_unfold stop next (next a))"
apply(cases "stop a")
apply simp
apply(cases "stop a")
by(simp_all add: enat_unfold)
